p: Stilbenoids are another group of phenolic compounds with significant roles in plant defense [ 36, 37], growth inhibition [ 38] and insect repellent [ 39], and also exhibit medicinal properties such as antioxidant activity [ 40] antibacterial and antifungal activities [ 41, 42]. Three new stilbenoids (HM1, HM2 and HM3) and 19 known stilbenoids (Dihydroresveratrol; canniprene; cannabistilbene I, IIa, and IIb; cannithrene; cannabispirone; cannabispirenone, etc.) were isolated from cannabis [ 43, 44]. These stilbenoids have been found in stems [ 45], leaves [ 46], and resins [ 47].
